about_the_game: Welcome to the Ice DLC! This is an expansion pack for The Croaker, which introduces 5 new ice-themed levels for you to play! Before you are like, "Only 5 levels? Why would I spend money on this?", well, most updates should come with a new level for this Ice DLC. Along with the 5 levels it adds, in The Croaker 1.1 (So an update from now), you will be able to create levels in the level editor using Ice and upload them for other Ice DLC members to play. Also, when you complete the Ice DLC, you unlock a new Ice variant of the Frog skin.
detailed_description: Welcome to the Ice DLC! This is an expansion pack for The Croaker, which introduces 5 new ice-themed levels for you to play! Before you are like, "Only 5 levels? Why would I spend money on this?", well, most updates should come with a new level for this Ice DLC. Along with the 5 levels it adds, in The Croaker 1.1 (So an update from now), you will be able to create levels in the level editor using Ice and upload them for other Ice DLC members to play. Also, when you complete the Ice DLC, you unlock a new Ice variant of the Frog skin.
legal_notice: Do not distribute this game on any site where you could purchase it for free, as that is pirating, which is illegal in the United States.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 14600K / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel/AMD Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: This game is not resource-dependent at all. Processor and graphics card really don't matter.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 14790F and up / AMD equivalent(s)
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel/AMD Integrated Graphics or bette
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: This game is not resource-dependent at all. Processor and graphics card really don't matter.

short_description: An Ice-Themed Expansion Pack with tons of new levels!
